headline: Avery Dennison (AVY) Partners with Walmart on RFID for Fresh Food—How Could This Shape Supply Chain Leadership?
summary: Walmart and Avery Dennison recently announced a joint innovation that expands radio-frequency identification (RFID) technology into fresh food categories like bakery, meat, and deli, aiming to improve inventory management and reduce food waste using sensor-enabled labels in challenging environments. This first-to-market solution enables digital tracking of use-by dates and product freshness, directly supporting Walmart's sustainability goals and bringing new visibility to fresh food supply...
